marklogic.body:
Super trading day!!! Tomorrow's News release Will Have You Drooling With Excitement. IK_CC . OB pricing and trading hits highest 3 months trading volume! Gain of 42.2% on Weds Mar 28 modest but welcome to the future generation.
Trade date: Thursday, March 29 Symbol: IK_CC . OB Now: .155 Range: $0.13-0.18
Big News release imminent! Explosive growth opportunity! Our palms are Itching just thinking about making major Income fast with IK_CC . OB and I'd like you to profit right along with us. Our alert for March 29 is FACEUP GAMING - IK_CC . OB, and the stock closed Wed at 0.155. Besides it technical set-up, the company is in the Virtual gaming Casino Contest business. Trading volumes and prices based on recent beta results of IK_CC . OB, are providing the right mix of interest activity and volatility to make your day!!! Recognizing the potential and demand Increasing Audience stemming from the internet gaming segment. Look for awesome results on Thurs Mar 29!
